author: poirier
msg: core: AllowEncodedSlashes new option NoDecode to allow encoded slashes
in request URL path info but not decode them.

author: tveronezi
msg: The server was not loading the EntityBeans.

* ReadDescriptors: line 108 -> The PersistenceModule class uses the moduleName as rootUrl. The system was throwing an IllegalArgumentException due to the invalid url created by the "getAbsolutePath" method call.
* PersistenceUnitInfoImpl: line 208 -> Just for safety I keep the old way to create the root object on the "catch" block.

author: dkulp
msg: Fix a couple uses of generics.   Add migration guide to site

author: julianfoad
msg: (update_deleted_locked_files): Restore a part of the test that was removed
in r881434. It will now check a files that's directly deleted as well as
one whose parent dir is deleted.
